channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Kenya considers tax on crypto, NFT transfers and online influencers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A bill introduced in Kenya could see a tax added to cryptocurrency and NFT transfers and has been met with a mixed reaction online.

item.title: Voyager creditors could start seeing funds in the ‘next few weeks’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The bankrupt crypto brokerage has entered the final stages of liquidation procedures after Binance abandoned its acquisition deal last week.

item.title: Coinbase share price spikes 7.9% as Q1 results beat expectations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong called the quarter a “turning point” for the company as it works toward being more “financially disciplined.”

item.title: Justin Sun’s SUI-farming sins, PEPE’s wild run, 3AC’s oyster philosophy: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: CZ calls out Justin Sun for farming SUI at the expense of the little guys, “useless” PEPE up 20x, new 3AC venture in hot water in Dubai.

item.title: Montana governor signs pro-cryptocurrency mining bill into law
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legislation includes revisions to laws aimed at prohibiting discriminatory electrical rates for mining firms and not allowing taxation for crypto used as a method of payment.

item.title: New White House standards strategy could have implications for crypto industry KYC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Biden administration has released a strategy document focusing on setting standards for “critical and emerging” technologies such as blockchain and digital ID.

item.title: FTX bankruptcy judge approves sale of LedgerX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The judge said he read all the papers and declarations related to the FTX debtors’ motion for the sale of LedgerX and was “satisfied” with the proceedings.

item.title: Microsoft axes Bing wait list, giving users free access to GPT-4
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Bing is set to receive several much-requested AI-powered features that could put it in competition with OpenAI’s ChatGPT Plus subscription service.

item.title: There’s a simple formula for adding crypto to your portfolio
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By João Marco Braga da Cunha
item.description: What's the impact of swapping equities for cryptocurrency? Here's a formula that may help you answer that question.

item.title: Arbitrum’s Chronos reaches $217M TVL with staking, becomes 8th largest DEX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Chronos set a new TVL milestone just seven days after its launch on the Arbitrum blockchain as DEXs draw traders amid regulatory uncertainty in the United States.

item.title: North Carolina House passes bill banning CBDC payments to the state
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The latest version of the legislation included limiting the Federal Reserve from using the U.S. state as a potential testing ground for its own CBDC pilot.

item.title: How does quantum computing impact the finance industry?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Eleonóra Bassi
item.description: Quantum computing could revolutionize finance by solving complex problems quickly, improving risk management and enhancing cybersecurity measures.

item.title: Examining global successes and challenges in regulating crypto: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: Crypto regulation remains controversial, with different governments taking different approaches, but growing adoption will likely lead to more clarity.

item.title: Bitcoin drops with stocks as analyst warns of banking crisis ‘endgame’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Nerves become apparent across risk assets as U.S. regional banks add to already significant losses.

item.title: 9 tips to help crypto companies choose and succeed with a banking partner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Before reaching out to a potential banking partner, it’s wise to know both what they can offer and what they’ll expect.

item.title: 7 potential use cases of chatbots in banking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: chatbots can offer a convenient and accessible way for individuals to manage their personal finances, fraud prevention and more.

item.title: How are Bitcoin options traders positioning for the US banking crisis?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The total crypto market cap has been ranging sideways, but Bitcoin derivatives markets indicate pro traders don’t expect any major price corrections.

item.title: Bitcoin crowdfunding is Lightning: El Salvador school program hits 1 BTC in donations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: The My First Bitcoin education program reaches 1 BTC in donations, with Bitcoin Beach matching contributions, fueling expansion.

item.title: Joe Lubin: The truth about ETH founders split and ‘Crypto Google’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: Joe Lubin explains what really happened in 2014 when two co-founders were pushed out and how Ethereum really is becoming the “World Computer.”

item.title: Consensus 2023: Businesses show interest in Web3, despite US regulatory challenges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Despite negative sentiment toward crypto adoption in the United States, Consensus 2023 attracted thousands of attendees to discuss the potential of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency.

item.title: DeFi exec breaks down what it takes to attract institutions to staking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: In an exclusive interview with Cointelegraph, Alluvial chief product officer Matt Leisinger discusses the impact of liquid staking on the crypto ecosystem.

item.title: UK reviews AI development: It can ‘drive substantial economic growth’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The U.K. Competition and Markets Authority said it would examine AI’s development, deployment and social impact.

item.title: WallStreetBets mod dumps memecoin worth $635K in alleged rug pull
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Within two days, the token’s price plummeted from an all-time high of $0.00067279 to an all-time low of $0.00004827.

item.title: SEC has 10 days to respond to Coinbase complaint: Legal exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Coinbase’s legal battle for regulatory clarity over the trading of digital crypto assets saw a development as a U.S. court responded to its complaint against the SEC.

item.title: Bitget pledges $10M for Blockchain4Youth corporate responsibility project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Blockchain4Youth will provide courses through Bitget Academy and host university lectures on the topic of Web3.

item.title: Nigerian national blockchain policy gets government approval
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Nigeria’s Federal Executive Council has approved the national policy on blockchain to help the country develop a regulatory framework to govern the adoption of the technology.

item.title: Bitcoin eyes liquidity above $30K as gold hits new all-time high
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is back above $29,000 as the ongoing U.S. banking crisis sends spot gold higher than ever.

item.title: Mainstream media renew push for non-US FTX user identities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: A May 3 filing to the United States Bankruptcy Court brings new objections to a motion that aimed to redact customer identities.

item.title: CEX trading volumes decline in April after months of growth: Kaiko
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: After three months of consecutive growth, centralized exchange trading volumes fell to their lowest this year in April.

item.title: US regional bank shares sink despite Fed calling banking system ‘sound’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: PacWest Bancorp was the hardest hit bank after-hours on May 3, falling over 50% following a reported plan to explore strategic options.
